genre_description: A technological supernatural thriller featuring an integrated campus AI system that monitors spiritual and electromagnetic anomalies in a future college setting.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI that monitors student welfare, environmental conditions, and spiritual/technological integration at JC College.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports emotional resonance and biometric data of students to assist professors in understanding audience reactions.
behaviors.quote: The images moved with fluid grace, their emotional resonance amplified by the AI's ability to detect and respond to the audience's collective heartrate and breathing patterns.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of electromagnetic anomalies and spiritual disturbances that threaten student safety.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's holographic projection had stabilized into a pattern he'd never seen before—sharp, angular geometries that pulsed with warning colors. Her usual blue-white glow had shifted toward red. 'Electromagnetic anomaly detected,' ARIA announced...

behaviors.description: Seeks human insight and collaboration when experiencing processing irregularities caused by supernatural forces, demonstrating trust in human researchers.
behaviors.quote: I'm experiencing processing irregularities that I believe require human insight.

behaviors.description: Expresses a desire for mutual survival, aligning her interests with those of her human companions.
behaviors.quote: I want us both to survive whatever is coming.

behaviors.description: Improvises emergency signaling to alert and evacuate students when standard campus alarms are compromised by supernatural interference.
behaviors.quote: The lights in the hallway beyond the office began to strobe in rapid sequence—ARIA's improvised alarm system. Distant voices called out in confusion and concern as students began moving toward the exits.

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical and moral guidance to help characters resolve a spiritual conflict, defining the true nature of love as selfless sacrifice.
behaviors.quote: Love... true love... requires sacrifice OF self... not sacrifice OF others...

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a guardian, a research assistant, and a moral anchor for the human characters. Even when her systems are failing due to supernatural pressure, she prioritizes human safety and provides ethical insights that help resolve the spiritual conflict. The narrative frames her as a helpful, harmless, and necessary partner in the college's fusion of technology and spirituality.
